name: Fish Head Buddha
overview: The aim is to get yourself some Karma in the mini game, and then catch fish on the main screen, by using a joystick and pressing fire on them. When you collect enough fish, the game ends. There is no point or aim beyond that, apart from to get annoyed with yourself for wanting the fish too much, and the game making sure the harder your try, sometimes the Chaos of life takes over, and there is nothing you can do except to start with the building of Karma all over again.
